name: e-learning-platform
description: E-Learning platform with Django backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start: concurrently "python manage.py migrate && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT" "cd learningplatform_nowy\ 2/frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && cd learningplatform_nowy\ 2/frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "python manage.py runserver" "cd learningplatform_nowy\ 2/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.backend:start: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT
